column4: Hey everybody, I've got a usb stick with write protect on (no hardware switch) and I'm unable to format it, how should I do to format it?
sudo mkfs.vfat /dev/sdb1 # Or something like that.
done already, says it can't open the device 'cause it's read-only
Oh, so it's hardware-protected... um... I dunno honestly if there's no switch
